Classes/Store.html.name: Store

Structs/OrderedState.html#/s:8SwiftDux12.name: init(_:)
Structs/OrderedState.html#/s:8SwiftDux12.abstract: Create a new OrderedState with an ordered array of identifiable substates.

Structs/OrderedState.html#/s:8SwiftDux12.name: init(_:)
Structs/OrderedState.html#/s:8SwiftDux12.abstract: Create a new OrderedState with a variadic number of substates.

Structs/OrderedState.html#/s:8SwiftDux12.name: append(_:)
Structs/OrderedState.html#/s:8SwiftDux12.abstract: Append a new substate to the end of the OrderedState.

Structs/OrderedState.html#/s:8SwiftDux12.name: prepend(_:)
Structs/OrderedState.html#/s:8SwiftDux12.abstract: Prepend a new substate to the beginning of the OrderedState.

Structs/OrderedState.html#/s:8SwiftDux12.name: insert(_:at:)
Structs/OrderedState.html#/s:8SwiftDux12.abstract: Inserts a new substate at the given index OrderedState.

Structs/OrderedState.html#/s:8SwiftDux12.name: insert(contentsOf:at:)
Structs/OrderedState.html#/s:8SwiftDux12.abstract: Inserts a collection of substates at the given index OrderedState.

Structs/OrderedState.html#/s:8SwiftDux12.name: remove(forId:)

Structs/OrderedState.html#/s:8SwiftDux12.name: remove(at:)

Structs/OrderedState.html#/s:8SwiftDux12.name: move(from:to:)
